Kind of a builds bad habits for other games and generally has a weird community, definitely a bad game for starters. However, if you're looking for a formidable competitive challenge and have the skill, mindset, and learning ability, this game might be for you. Having said this, I probably wouldn't go back to maining this game after the hours I've put in.
